section.title: User Interfaces
section.para: JHotDraw 8 is designed for the creation of document-based applications which run on a personal computer with a graphical user interface.
Users can interact with the user interface of a JHotDraw 8 application using a keyboard, a mouse, a track pad or a touch screen.
The Macintosh Human Interface Guidelines and the Windows User Experience are supported explicitly by JHotDraw 8.
